trans-unit.source: Defines constants that indicate how a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell"></xref> is displayed.
trans-unit.target: Definerer konstanter som angir hvordan en <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell"> </xref> vises.

trans-unit.source: This enumeration is used by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DisplayStyle%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn> types to indicate the appearance of the cell when it is not in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: Denne nummerering brukes av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DisplayStyle%2A>for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn>datatyper for å angi utseendet til cellen når det ikke er i redigeringsmodus.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DisplayStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: In edit mode, the cell displays the hosted <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> control.
trans-unit.target: I redigeringsmodus, viser cellen den vertsbaserte <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>kontroll.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>

trans-unit.source: When it is not in edit mode, the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell"></xref> mimics the appearance of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Når det ikke er i redigeringsmodus, den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell"> </xref> etterligner utseendet til en <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: When it is not in edit mode, the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell"></xref> is displayed with a drop-down button but does not otherwise mimic the appearance of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Når det ikke er i redigeringsmodus, den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell"> </xref> vises med rullegardinlisten knappen, men ikke ellers etterligne utseendet til en <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: When it is not in edit mode, the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell"></xref> is displayed without a drop-down button.
trans-unit.target: Når det ikke er i redigeringsmodus, den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell"> </xref> vises uten en rullegardinlisten-knappen.
